alert.note: Alert for Northern Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 14 at 5:04AM AKST until November 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northern Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible, including along the mouth of the Inmachuk River in Deering. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves will push onshore, especially along west facing shores. Peak water levels are occurring now. Sustained northwest winds 20 to 30 mph will shift to the northeast on Wednesday at 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
